titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the happily-restored and reedified chappell of the Right Honorable the Earle of Exceter in his house, of S. Iohns On Saint Stephens day. 1623 By Ios. Hall, Deane of Worcester.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Kyngston, for George Winder, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstons Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstons Churchyard
